Package de.oth.blocklib.entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EasyExecuteProgram.TestEntity, FlyingRock, HandItem, InteractiveItem, Npc
public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable, java.io.Serializable
A single entity. Can be loaded by OBJLoader and rendered by the entity renderer. Object and texture need to be already in the graphic memory.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • Entity

      public Entity​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f rotation, java.lang.String modelName)

      Parameters:
      position - Position of the entity in world coordinates
      rotation - rotation of the Entity

    • update

      public void update​(float deltaTime)
      Update function for entities Updates velocity based on forces, position based on velocity, the current rotation, adds gravity
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - time since last update

    • applyForces

      protected void applyForces​(float deltaTime)

      Parameters:
      deltaTime - duration of the force

      velocity -
      min -
      Returns:

    • addForce

      public void addForce​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f force)
      Apply a force to the Entity for one Frame. If a continuous force should be applied, call this method in every frame where the force should be applied.
      Parameters:
      force - a directional force.
